title: Ticket #4387: job_dagman_repeat_holds not understood
description:
* job_dagman_repeat_holds: This fails for me when run manually, because the first line of job_dagman_repeat_holds.run is a blank line, which makes #! /usr/bin/env perl not take effect.

Hmm -- this is a really weird one -- in the runs with the old glue, the test is actually running in spite of the malformed .run file. But the output ends like this: 

  12:44:44 Test: executed unsuccessfully
  failure unexpected

and the test still shows up as green. I don't know what the hell is going on with that. I really don't know what's going on with this one, and whether it ever worked right.
creator: bt
